title: Role
description: A `Role` is a collection of `Policies` that provides access control. A user or a team can be assigned one or multiple roles that provide privileges to a user and members of a team to perform the job function.

displayName.description: Name used for display purposes. Example 'Data Consumer'.

updatedAt.description: Last update time corresponding to the new version of the entity in Unix epoch time milliseconds.

href.description: Link to the resource corresponding to this entity.

changeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

incrementalChangeDescription.description: Change that lead to this version of the entity.

allowDelete.description: Some system roles can't be deleted

allowEdit.description: Some system roles can't be edited

deleted.description: When `true` indicates the entity has been soft deleted.

policies.description: Policies that is attached to this role.

users.description: Users that have this role assigned to them.

teams.description: Teams that have this role assigned to them.

disabled.description: System policy can't be deleted. Use this flag to disable them.

domain.description: Domain the asset belongs to. When not set, the asset inherits the domain from the parent it belongs to.
